alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 12:29AM CST until February 22 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL JOHNSON AND SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Devils Knob, or 14 miles north of Clarksville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Woodland... Salus... Catalpa... Arbaugh... Harmony... Ozone... Hillcrest in Johnson County... Fallsville... Oark... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
